title: Dhaka Biryani
description: A fragrant and spicy biryani recipe from the heart of Dhaka, featuring tender pieces of mutton or chicken, and aromatic spices.

title: Chingri Malai Curry
description: A creamy and delectable prawn curry prepared with coconut milk, Bengali spices, and served with steamed rice.

title: Hilsa Bhapa
description: A traditional Bengali preparation of hilsa fish steamed with mustard paste and spices, a true delicacy of Bangladesh.

title: Bharta and Luchi
description: A classic pairing of mashed vegetables (bharta) and deep-fried flatbreads (luchi), a popular comfort food in Bangladesh.

title: Machher Jhol
description: A flavorful Bengali fish curry with spices and vegetables, served hot with steamed rice for a hearty meal.

title: Pitha
description: Assorted rice cakes, both sweet and savory, made with rice flour and coconut, a traditional Bangladeshi treat often enjoyed during festivals.
